name: Dust Grazer
description: A large, grotesque aberration, the Dust Grazer is known for its tendrils and a unique ability called Death Spores. It has a very poor Dexterity and a remarkably high Constitution.
memorable: It can potentially turn adversaries into Dust Grazers through its Death Spores ability upon death.
goals: To inflict poison damage and incapacitate its foes.
relations: Related to other aberrations or dangerous creatures that utilize poison or diseases.
environment: Typically found in desolate or contaminated areas.
strengths: High hit points, immunity to poison, and an ability to inflict ongoing damage through Death Spores.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Uses a long-reaching Tendril attack for bludgeoning and acid damage, alongside the ability to absorb creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Death Spores, which harms nearby creatures upon its death and can lead to their transformation into a Dust Grazer.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to navigate without sight.
skills: Has a poor passive perception, limiting its awareness of hidden threats.
additional_information: Grapples and restrains creatures with tendrils
Absorbs creatures, dealing acid damage over time
Can expel absorbed creatures if it takes enough damage
Turns slain foes into new Dust Grazers after two days
test_queries: grotesque monster that can absorb foes
flying aberration with high hit points
